Uses of Interface
camzup.pfriendly.ICamEntity

Packages that use ICamEntity 
Package Description
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of ICamEntity in camzup.pfriendly

    Classes in camzup.pfriendly that implement ICamEntity 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CamEntity2
    An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.
    class  CamEntity3
    An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.
    Methods in camzup.pfriendly that return ICamEntity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.frustum​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection matrix to the frustum defined by the edges of the view port.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.ortho​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection to orthographic, where objects maintain their size regardless of distance from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov, float aspect)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
    default ICamEntity ICamEntity.perspective​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, float fov, float aspect, float near, float far)
    Sets a renderer projection to a perspective, where objects nearer to the camera appear larger than objects distant from the camera.
